title: Substitute $$x^2+1$$ Into the Integral
text: For this problem, we would want to use the expression $$u=x^2+1$$ to find the antiderivative.
speech: For this problem, we would want to use the expression , u is equal to, x squared plus 1  to find the antiderivative.
